SENT.plain: Lateralis dorsalis nucleus of thalamus belong to the limbic system of Papez more by its trigonal than cingular afferent pathways
Its parietal efferent pathways are probable, its cingular and trigonal ones possible but not proved
Neuropathologic studies provide informations to separate a latero-ventral part connected with parietal cortex and a mediodorsal part connected with limbic system
